HomePage.description: Full-stack application with TypeScript and Python

hero.title: Develop exceptional leadership skills with AI coaching
hero.description: Practice difficult workplace conversations and receive real-time feedback to improve your communication and leadership skills.

howItWorks.title: How AI Leadership Coach Works
howItWorks.description: Our platform uses AI to create realistic conversation scenarios, allowing you to practice and improve your leadership skills in a safe environment.

1.title: Describe Your Scenario
1.description: Choose from pre-defined scenarios or create a custom one that matches your specific workplace challenges.

2.title: Practice with Voice AI
2.description: Engage in realistic voice conversations with our AI, which responds with different personalities and reactions.

3.title: Receive Detailed Feedback
3.description: Get personalized analysis on your tone, empathy, clarity, and structure with actionable improvement tips.

features.title: Powerful Features for Leadership Development
features.description: Everything you need to master difficult workplace conversations and become a more effective leader.

simulations.title: Realistic Simulations
simulations.description: Practice with AI that responds naturally to your communication style and approach.

voice.title: Voice-Based Training
voice.description: Engage in actual conversations that mimic real workplace interactions.

feedback.title: AI-Powered Feedback
feedback.description: Receive detailed analysis and personalized suggestions after each session.

progress.title: Progress Tracking
progress.description: Monitor your improvement over time with detailed metrics and insights.

gamification.title: Gamification
gamification.description: Stay motivated with badges, achievements, and progress milestones.

personalized.title: Personalized Learning
personalized.description: Focus on the specific skills and scenarios most relevant to your role.

cta.title: Ready to transform your leadership skills?
cta.description: Join thousands of professionals who are using AI to become more effective leaders.

footer.copyright: Â© 2025 AI Leadership Coach. All rights reserved.
